name: Data engineer
description: Als data engineer maak je bruikbare informatie van data, zodat er antwoord kan worden gegeven op de vragen van alle stakeholders. Ook geef ik de data zo goed mogelijk grafisch weer door middel van dashboard en rapportages.

name: Content developer
description: Content Developers research, prepare, write, and edit online content for marketing and front-end web development. They are involved in the writing of blog posts, static copy, and video content and well as the technical aspects, such as SEO and HTML formatting.
